original_text: The Jews gathered in their cities throughout all the provinces of King Ahasuerus to lay hands on those who sought their harm. And no one could stand against them, for the fear of them had fallen on all peoples.
korean_text: 유다인들이 아하수에로 왕의 각 지방, 각 읍에 모여 자기들을 해하고자 한 자를 죽이려 하니 모든 민족이 그들을 두려워하여 능히 막을 자가 없고

sentences.original_text: The Jews gathered in their cities
throughout all the provinces of King Ahasuerus
to lay hands on those who sought their harm
And no one could stand against them
for the fear of them had fallen on all peoples
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 모든 민족에게 그들의 두려움이 임하였음이라
